name: LSJ: episode 1
description:
This is a simple aim practice game for when you want to play an FPS. The point of this prototype is to click the red button as many times as possible within 5 seconds.  Hopefully at the end of this, you would have improved your FPS aim.

Key Features:

-Aim practice

-Quick reflexes 

-Score

the Bitbucket Link:

https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/lenny-jox_game-a-week_1/src/master/

Release notes:

-ver0.1. (Non-functioning scoreboard, button move on all clicks)

-ver1.1.(Fully functioning scoreboard, button moves on collision)

Credits:

Lenny Jox

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai
"Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
